channel.title: Help with compiller please!
channel.description: ok im coding my server and when the time comes to complie everything it says i dont have jdk 5 or 6. witch i already do? some people told me to edit it and to find java 6.0.0.11 and change that to what ever java i have. but the thing is i spent an hour trying to find that or something similar to it and theirs nothing. any help? can i download a compiler and put that into my server file and use it?

item.title: Help with compiller please!
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Right click edit your compiler and delete your old 1 and place this one in there

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

It should workâ€¦

Read full topic

@owner_duece wrote:

ok im coding my server and when the time comes to complie everything it says i dont have jdk 5 or 6.
witch i already do?
some people told me to edit it and to find java 6.0.0.11 and change that to what ever java i have.
but the thing is i spent an hour trying to find that or something similar to it and theirs nothing.
any help?
can i download a compiler and put that into my server file and use it?
